title: Student Loan Forgiveness Scam

steps.text: This is the Department of Education Student Loan Forgiveness Program. You qualify for complete loan forgiveness! This program ends next month, so act fast. We just need a $299 processing fee to start your application immediately.

choices.label: Pay the processing fee to get loan forgiveness
Contact my loan servicer directly to verify

steps.feedback: Legitimate loan forgiveness programs never require upfront fees or have artificial deadlines.

debrief: AUTHORITY + URGENCY + FOOT-IN-DOOR: Student loan scams impersonate government agencies and create false deadlines to pressure quick payment of 'processing fees.' Real loan forgiveness programs are free and don't have arbitrary deadlines. Always verify through your actual loan servicer.
